name: Spezifikation des Verlade- Umladepunkts:
description:
for LPG liquid line:
- Ball valve 3" CL 300 reduced port flanged
- Pressure gauge 1/2" 0-400 PSI
- Ball valve 1/2" #3000
- Ball valve 1" #3000
- Relief valve 1" with setting pressure 12.5 bar
- Swing check valve 2" emergency shutdown series / model 7605B
- Steel pipe coupling 2" #2000
- Hose, propane 3"350 PSI Male NPT with clamp boss 
and four bolts, 20 ft long
- Globe valve 3" NPT 400 PSI, ductile iron body
- ACME coupling 3" fmale NPT x 2" male NPT

for LPG vapor line:
- 3 Stck Ball valve 2" CL 300 reduced port LPG loading 
- Pressure gauge 1/2" 0-400PSI
- Ball valve 1/2" #3000
- Ball valve 1" #3000
- Relief valve 1" with setting pressure 25 bar
- Steel pipe coupling 2"#2000
- Hose propane 2" 350 PSI Male NPT with clamp boss
and four bolts, 20 ft long.
- Globe valve 2" NPT 400 PSL ductile iron body 
- ACME Coupling 2 1/4" female NPT x 1 1/4" male NPT.
